oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Model 98/05 bayonet with scabbard
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: This Model 98/05 bayonet with scabbard and frog, was brought back as a souvenir by Pvt. Robert William Scollon, 15th U.S. Engineer Regt. Commonly called a "butcher blade" this model was the standard bayonet for the German Army during World War, 1914-1918. There is a small cryptic mark on the proper left ricasso.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918 - History
